00025 #include "test_failure_test.hpp"
00026 #include <aeryn/test_failure.hpp>
00027 #include <aeryn/test_funcs.hpp>
00028 #include <string>
00029 
00030 namespace Aeryn
00031 {
00033         namespace
00034         {
00036                 const std::string failureMsg    = "Test failed!";
00037 
00039                 const unsigned long line                        = __LINE__;
00040 
00042                 const std::string file                          = __FILE__;
00043         }
00044                 
00046         void TestFailureTest::BasicAccessor
00047                         ()
00048         {
00049                 TestFailure testFailure( failureMsg, line, file.c_str() );
00050                 IS_EQUAL( failureMsg, testFailure.Failure() );
00051                 IS_EQUAL( line, testFailure.Line() );
00052                 IS_EQUAL( file, testFailure.File() );
00053         }
00054 
00056         void TestFailureTest::CopyConstructor
00057                 ()
00058         {
00059                 TestFailure testFailure( failureMsg, line, file.c_str() );
00060                 TestFailure copy( testFailure );
00061                 IS_EQUAL( failureMsg, copy.Failure() );
00062                 IS_EQUAL( line, copy.Line() );
00063                 IS_EQUAL( file, copy.File() );
00064         }
00065 
00067         void TestFailureTest::CopyAssignmentOperator
00068                 ()
00069         {
00070                 TestFailure testFailure( failureMsg, line, file.c_str() );
00071                 TestFailure copy( "", 0, "" );
00072                 copy = testFailure;
00073                 IS_EQUAL( failureMsg, copy.Failure() );
00074                 IS_EQUAL( line, copy.Line() );
00075                 IS_EQUAL( file, copy.File() );
00076         }
00077 
00079 }
